com.github.nfcforandroid.api.beans

Class NfaWriteBean<Record extends INfaRecord>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nfcforandroid.api.beans.NfaWriteBean<Record>
  • Type Parameters:
    Record - the record to write

    public final class NfaWriteBean<Record extends INfaRecord>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jefBinomed Configuration bean that gives mandatory information about how to write data on a tag :
    • A INfaWriter for the conversion
      A INfaRecord for the data
    • To create a such instance, you have to use the builder NfaWriteBean.writeBeanConfigure().writer(YourWriter).record(YourRecord).build();

    • Method Detail

      • getNfaWriter

        public INfaWriter<Record> getNfaWriter()
        Returns:
        the writer to use to convert data. Could not be null

      • getNfaRecord

        public Record getNfaRecord()
        Returns:
        the data to write. Could not be null

      • isForceReinit

        public boolean isForceReinit()
        Returns:
        true if we have to reset the record after the write. false else. The default value returns true.

      • writeBeanConfigure

        public static <Record extends INfaRecord> NfaWriteBean.NfaWriteBeanBuilder<Record> writeBeanConfigure()
        Returns:
        a new instance of NfaWriteBean.NfaWriteBeanBuilder on each call
